text:

ot find config file [webapps\central-logging\WEB-INF\classes\.lcf].

creator: hoju@visi.com
text:
This is a question, not a bug report.  Please use the Log4j-user mailing list
and do *not* open another bug report for this unless you suspect an actual bug
in Log4j.  Curt Arnold explained this very clearly in bug 44331.  Please follow
his advice.

Jake

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 44331 ***
